meanings.def: used in negative sentences and in questions instead of somewhere
examples: Many of these animals are not found anywhere else.
He's never been anywhere outside Britain.

meanings.def: in, at or to any place, when it does not matter where
examples: I could go anywhere in the world.
The job doesn't pay anywhere near enough for me.
The job doesn't pay anywhere near enough for me.
Older cars are nowhere near as fuel-efficient as modern cars.
The job doesn't pay anywhere near enough for me.
The job doesn't pay anywhere near enough for me.
Older cars are nowhere near as fuel-efficient as modern cars.

related: I, you, etc. can’t take somebody anywhere
get somebody nowhere/not get somebody anywhere

meanings.def: used in negative sentences and in questions instead of somewhere
examples: I don't have anywhere to stay.
Do you know anywhere I can get my bike repaired?
